gamerule.alwaysHungry.description: Determines whether any food can be eaten regardless of hunger level in survival or adventure mode.
gamerule.hungerLimitsSaturation.descript: If true, limit the player's saturation level to never exceed the current hunger level.
gamerule.maxExhaustion.description: Maximum exhaustion level before hunger or saturation is lost (larger numbers mean longer durations before loss). Set to 0 or below to disable exhaustion.
gamerule.maxSaturation.description: Maximum saturation level for players (set below 0 to disable this limit). Set "Hunger limits saturation" to false to allow saturation levels above 20.
gamerule.saturationEffectDecayRate.descr: If a player has the Saturation status effect, the rate of saturation gain will decrease the more saturation they already have. Use larger values to amplify this decreasing rate, or set to 0 to disable this mechanic (not recommended).
